com.github.sanity4j.util

Class RegexpReplaceInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • com.github.sanity4j.util.RegexpReplaceInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class RegexpReplaceInputStream
extends java.io.InputStream

    An InputStream implementation that replaced a regexp within the original stream with a replacement regexp string "on the fly".

    This class will use a fixed size "lookahead" buffer, so it is possible that a regexp longer than the "lookahead", will not be matched. If expecting particularly long regexp matches (> 4096 characters) use the RegexpReplaceInputStream(InputStream, String, String, int) constructor, and specify a lookahead long enough to ensure that all regexps matched will fit within the lookahead.

    Since:
    Sanity4J 1.0
    Author:
    Brian Kavanagh, Yiannis Paschalidis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RegexpReplaceInputStream(java.io.InputStream backing, java.lang.String regexp, java.lang.String replaceRegexp)
      This constructor creates a RegexpReplaceInputStream which replaces a single regexp, backed by a specified InputStream with a default buffer size.
      RegexpReplaceInputStream(java.io.InputStream backing, java.lang.String regexp, java.lang.String replaceRegexp, int lookaheadLength)
      This constructor creates a RegexpReplaceInputStream which replaces a single regexp, backed by a specified InputStream with a explicitly specified "lookahead" buffer size.
      RegexpReplaceInputStream(java.io.InputStream backing, java.lang.String regexp, java.lang.String replaceRegexp, int lookaheadLength, boolean replaceAll)
      This constructor creates a RegexpReplaceInputStream backed by a specified InputStream with a explicitly specified "lookahead" buffer size.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int read()
      This method reads a character from the underlying InputStream, replacing a match to the given regexp with the replacement text along the way.

      • RegexpReplaceInputStream

        public RegexpReplaceInputStream(java.io.InputStream backing,
                                java.lang.String regexp,
                                java.lang.String replaceRegexp,
                                int lookaheadLength)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        This constructor creates a RegexpReplaceInputStream which replaces a single regexp, backed by a specified InputStream with a explicitly specified "lookahead" buffer size.
        Parameters:
        backing - The InputStream backing this RegexpReplaceInputStream.
        regexp - The regexp to be replaced.
        replaceRegexp - The replacement regexp string.
        lookaheadLength - The length of the "lookahead" buffer used for pattern matching.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error reading from the backing stream.

      • RegexpReplaceInputStream

        public RegexpReplaceInputStream(java.io.InputStream backing,
                                java.lang.String regexp,
                                java.lang.String replaceRegexp,
                                int lookaheadLength,
                                boolean replaceAll)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        This constructor creates a RegexpReplaceInputStream backed by a specified InputStream with a explicitly specified "lookahead" buffer size.
        Parameters:
        backing - The InputStream backing this RegexpReplaceInputStream.
        regexp - The regexp to be replaced.
        replaceRegexp - The replacement regexp string.
        lookaheadLength - The size of the lookahead buffer.
        replaceAll - A flag which indicates whether (true) or not (false) we should replace all occurances of the regexp in the stream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error reading from the backing stream.
